dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2943 IS: To amend Public Law 110–299 to extend the time period during which permits are not required for certain discharges incidental to the normal operation of vessels.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Rubio (for himself, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Inhofe, Mr. Vitter, Mr. Walsh, and Mr. Whitehouse) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend Public Law 110–299 to extend the time period during which permits are not required for certain discharges incidental to the normal operation of vessels.

section.header: Discharges incidental to normal operation of vessels
section.text:
Section 2(a) of Public Law 110–299
(
33 U.S.C. 1342 note) is amended by striking December 18, 2014 and inserting December 18, 2015.
